snippet.title: Longplay of Bug Too!
snippet.description:
Longplay of Bug Too!, played as the NTSC version on the Sega Saturn.  This game's version was released on Nov 30th, 1996.  Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

0:00:00 - Start
0:00:45 - Intro Movie

0:02:05 - Weevil Dead 2: Cutscene

0:11:20 - Weevil Dead 2: Scene 2
0:20:46 - Weevil Dead 2: Scene 3
0:30:20 - Weevil Dead 2: Boss Fight
0:31:22 - Weevil Dead 2: Bumpercar Bonus

0:32:04 - Lawrence of Arachnia: Cutscene
0:32:42 - Lawrence of Arachnia: Scene 1
0:40:40 - Lawrence of Arachnia: Scene 2
0:48:34 - Lawrence of Arachnia: Scene 3
0:55:06 - Lawrence of Arachnia: Scene 4
1:01:38 - Lawrence of Arachnia: Scene 5
1:09:20 - Lawrence of Arachnia: Boss Fight
1:11:26 - Lawrence of Arachnia: Bumpercar Bonus

1:12:06 - Antennae Day: Cutscene
1:12:43 - Antennae Day: Scene 1
1:28:24 - Antennae Day: Scene 2
1:38:42 - Antennae Day: Scene 3
1:44:58 - Antennae Day: Scene 4
1:49:59 - Antennae Day: Scene 5
1:54:57 - Antennae Day: Boss Fight
1:57:12 - Antennae Day: Bumpercar Bonus

1:58:05 - Fleewee's Big Adventure: Cutscene
1:58:52 - Fleewee's Big Adventure: Scene 1
2:08:45 - Fleewee's Big Adventure: Scene 2
2:17:28 - Fleewee's Big Adventure: Scene 3
2:22:36 - Fleewee's Big Adventure: Boss Fight
2:23:18 - Fleewee's Big Adventure:  Bumpercar Bonus

2:24:06 - Swatter World: Cutscene
2:24:56 - Swatter World: Scene 1
2:43:49 - Swatter World: Scene 2
2:50:53 - Swatter World: Boss Fight
2:52:00 - Swatter World: Bumpercar Bonus

2:52:42 - Cicada Night Fever: Cutscene
2:53:19 - Cicada Night Fever: Scene 1
3:06:56 - Cicada Night Fever: Scene 2
3:17:20 - Cicada Night Fever: Boss Fight

3:19:30 - Ending + Credits

By: Retro Game Spacko
